testcase.classname: Ability to edit flight Goal data in Campaigns
testcase.name: 01 No goal set in the Goal Type/Value box
testcase.system-out: Given I am a Proteus User...................................................passed And I have the role: Pro Web Campaigns......................................passed And I go to the Proteus Home URL in my browser..............................passed When Login as "ADMINISTRATOR"...............................................passed Then The main homepage loads successfully...................................passed When I click on "Campaigns" from home page..................................passed Then All Flights loads which I have access to...............................passed When I search/filter for a flight with No goal..............................passed And Click on Apply button...................................................passed Then There is an Add icon in the box orange to inform the user action is required.passed And The box states 'Goal Info and Target'...................................passed

testcase.classname: Ability to edit flight Goal data in Campaigns
testcase.name: 02 Add/Edit goal set in the Goal Type/Value box
testcase.system-out: Given I am a Proteus User...................................................passed And I have the role: Pro Web Campaigns......................................passed And I go to the Proteus Home URL in my browser..............................passed When Login as "ADMINISTRATOR"...............................................passed Then The main homepage loads successfully...................................passed When I click on "Campaigns" from home page..................................passed Then All Flights loads which I have access to...............................passed When I search/filter for a flight with No goal..............................passed And Click on Apply button...................................................passed Then There is an Add icon in the box orange to inform the user action is required.passed When Click on Add 'Goal Info and Target'....................................passed Then Option to select Goal Type and Goal Value exist........................passed When Select Goal Type, Goal Value and Save..................................passed Then Selected Goal Type and Goal Values saved...............................passed Then There is an edit icon in the box.......................................passed When Click to edit Goal Type................................................passed Then Option to select Goal Type and Goal Value exist........................passed When Edit Goal Type, Goal Value and Save....................................passed Then Edited Goal Type and Goal Values saved.................................passed
